required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Survey of Diet and Health Beliefs
clinical_study.official_title: Effect of Dietary Advice Source on Perceptions of Information Accuracy and Intended Compliance

lead_sponsor.agency: USDA Grand Forks Human Nutrition Research Center

clinical_study.source: USDA Grand Forks Human Nutrition Research Center

brief_summary.textblock: The purpose of this research is to better understand people's health and diet knowledge, beliefs, attitudes, and practices. The researchers will use this information to implement better strategies to help Americans maintain more nutritious diets.

detailed_description.textblock: The overall goal of this study is to determine whether there are differences in perceptions of healthy nutrition messages depending on from whom the message is coming. More specifically, the researchers aim to examine whether there are differences in how people perceive and intend to follow nutrition information that is coming from a variety of sources.

primary_outcome.description: Participants will rate the extent to which they trust the source of health information (i.e., the makers of the flyer) on a 7-point Likert-type scale ranging from not at all (1) to completely (7).

arm_group.description: No source will be indicated on information provided for review
A government logo will be shown on information provided for review
A medical logo will be shown on information provided for review
A social media logo will be shown on information provided for review

intervention.description: Participants will see the same health advice, with no source or one of three other sources indicated

study_pop.textblock: Participants will include American adults aged 18 and over. Minors, i.e., those under 18, will be excluded. To participate, people must have access to internet. Therefore, by default, those who do not have internet access will be excluded from this study. Due to the nature of this study, participants from all over the country will be eligible to participate.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- US citizen
- have access to internet
- have an Amazon Mechanical Turk (MTurk) account
Exclusion Criteria:
- under 18 years of age
- no access to internet

overall_official.affiliation: USDA Grand Forks Human Nutrition Research Center
USDA Grand Forks Human Nutrition Research Center

facility.name: USDA Grand Forks Human Nutrition Research Center

responsible_party.investigator_affiliation: USDA Grand Forks Human Nutrition Research Center
